The homework is STUDY that simple. No assignments just quizzes, practicals and exams. These are planned no surprises. You can record the lectures. If you fail that is on you!

comments: Dr. K is the best A&P professor I have ever had! On day one he goes over the syllabus in full detail (content, grading, etc.). The grade is based on 4 lecture exams, 3 lab practicals, and 5 lab quizzes. For the most part, his tests are easy if you study, and he tells you exactly what to focus on. I have never had such a caring teacher as him.
